verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab:<s%> for in a <S%H3915>night,<s%> <S%H6144>Ar<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> is laid <S%H7703>waste,<s%> and brought to <S%H1820>nothing;<s%> for in a <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H7024>Kir<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> is laid <S%H7703>waste,<s%> and brought to <S%H1820>nothing.<s%>

They have gone <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1006>Bayith,<s%> and to <S%H1769>Dibon,<s%> to the high <S%H1116>places,<s%> to <S%H1065>weep.<s%> <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H3213>wails<s%> over <S%H5015>Nebo<s%> and over <S%H4311>Medeba.<s%> <S%H7144>Baldness<s%> is on all of their <S%H7218>heads.<s%> Every <S%H2206>beard<s%> is cut <S%H1438>off.<s%>

In their <S%H2351>streets,<s%> they <S%H2296>clothe<s%> themselves in <S%H8242>sackcloth.<s%> In their <S%H7339>streets<s%> and on their <S%H1406>housetops,<s%> everyone <S%H3213>wails,<s%> <S%H1065>weeping<s%> <S%H3381>abundantly.<s%>

<S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> <S%H2199>cries<s%> out with <S%H500>Elealeh.<s%> Their <S%H6963>voice<s%> is <S%H8085>heard<s%> even to <S%H3096>Jahaz.<s%> Therefore the armed <S%H2502>men<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> cry <S%H7321>aloud.<s%> Their <S%H5315>souls<s%> tremble within <S%H3415>them.<s%>

My <S%H3820>heart<s%> cries <S%H2199>out<s%> for <S%H4124>Moab!<s%> Her <S%H1280>nobles<s%> flee to <S%H6820>Zoar,<s%> to <S%H5697>Eglath<s%> <S%H7992>Shelishiyah;<s%> for they go <S%H4608>up<s%> by the <S%H5927>ascent<s%> of <S%H3872>Luhith<s%> with <S%H1065>weeping;<s%> for in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2773>Horonaim,<s%> they raise <S%H5927>up<s%> a <S%H2201>cry<s%> of <S%H7667>destruction.<s%>

For the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H5249>Nimrim<s%> will be <S%H4923>desolate;<s%> for the <S%H1877>grass<s%> has withered <S%H3001>away,<s%> the tender <S%H1877>grass<s%> <S%H3615>fails,<s%> there is no green <S%H3418>thing.<s%>

Therefore they will <S%H6213>carry<s%> away the <S%H3502>abundance<s%> they have <S%H6213>gotten,<s%> and that which they have stored <S%H6486>up,<s%> over the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of the <S%H6155>willows.<s%>

For the <S%H2201>cry<s%> has gone <S%H5362>around<s%> the <S%H1366>borders<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab;<s%> its <S%H3215>wailing<s%> to <S%H97>Eglaim,<s%> and its <S%H3215>wailing<s%> to Beer <S%H879>Elim.<s%>

For the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H1775>Dimon<s%> are <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H1818>blood;<s%> for I will <S%H7896>bring<s%> yet <S%H3254>more<s%> on <S%H1775>Dimon,<s%> a <S%H738>lion<s%> on those of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> who <S%H6413>escape,<s%> and on the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H127>land.<s%>
